text:
Stack41 | Hardware and Software Engineer | Milwaukee, WI | ONSITE | https://www.stack41.com/

Stack41 is a Data Center-as-a-Service company that also engineers industrial IoT data collection processes. We are really cool people working on really cool things.

We are not looking for a specific education; we are looking for applicants to have good common sense, a broad exposure to technology/engineering and its culture. We have a relaxed work environment.

Please start a conversation with us by sending an email to me at dremmel@stack41.com.
